thread.title: British double-decker buses hit Mexico City

title: British double-decker buses hit Mexico City
text:
British double-decker buses hit Mexico City 8:43am EDT - 01:35 
Dozens of British double-deckers have hit Mexico City as part of a one billion peso ($56 million dollar) deal with the U.K. to help the sprawling capital tackle traffic and pollution. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Dozens of British double-deckers have hit Mexico City as part of a one billion peso ($56 million dollar) deal with the U.K. to help the sprawling capital tackle traffic and pollution.
